translation.en: …birthday, dear Franny
Happy birthday to you
- Happy birthday. - Good job, girls.
translation.es: - Feliz cumple, Franny. - Muy bien, chicas.

translation.en: Oh, I love you, baby, so much!
Come on!
I'm gonna get you guys some cake.
- Uh, I'll get some wine.  - Okay.
- Let me do that. - Oh.
translation.es: Yo lo hago. Así puedes comer algo.

translation.en: - That way, you can actually eat. - Thank you.
translation.es: Yo lo hago. Así puedes comer algo. Gracias.

translation.en: You've been looking so thin, you're making us moms look terrible.
translation.es: Estás tan delgada que nos haces quedar mal a las demás mamás.

translation.en: - Good, right? - Yeah.
What's the matter, Mom?
It's hot. Your father can't keep his eyes open.
translation.es: Hace calor. Está cabeceando de sueño.

translation.en: - Oh, I'm fine. - It is a four- hour drive from Worcester.
translation.es: - Estoy bien. - Nos esperan cuatro horas en auto.

translation.en: I know. I'm going to make you guys some coffee.
translation.es: Ya sé. Les voy a preparar café.

translation.en: Can you make a pot of coffee? And we need another bottle of white wine.
translation.es: ¿Podrías preparar café? Y necesitamos otro vino blanco.

translation.en: White wine, right. On it. Mom, can you do the coffee?
translation.es: Vino blanco, enseguida. Mamá, ¿harías el café?

translation.en: I'll be right back.
Everyone, if you all raise your cups. To Dr. George, huh?
translation.es: Todos, levanten sus copas. Por el doctor George.

translation.en: Hear, hear!
- It is official, right? - Yeah, it is officially official.
- Yeah, I'm no longer a PhD widow. -
translation.es: Sí, ya no soy viuda de un doctorando.

translation.en: And I have some more good news.
Uh, my dissertation actually landed me a gig upstate.
translation.es: Gracias a mi tesis, conseguí trabajo en el norte.

translation.en: - Wow, fast. - It must be really good.
translation.es: - Vaya, qué rápido. - Debe ser muy buena tesis.

translation.en: I haven't read it yet.
- George is very secretive. - No, I am chickenshit.
translation.es: - George es muy reservado. - No, soy un cobarde.

translation.en: Catherine was top of the class at art school.
translation.es: Catherine era la mejor en la escuela de arte.

translation.en: - Oh, is the position at Bard? - No, it's at Saginaw.
translation.es: ¿Es un puesto en Bard? No, en Saginaw.

translation.en: It's a small private college upstate.
You're a big city girl now with your dream job.
translation.es: Eres una chica de ciudad con el trabajo soñado.

translation.en: You thought this through?
George really wants this. He hates the struggle here.
translation.es: George anhela esto. Odia estar en apuros económicos.

translation.en: It's gotten worse since his father cut him off.
translation.es: Empeoró desde que su padre no le envía dinero.

translation.en: And I had no idea he was even taking money from them.
translation.es: Yo ni sabía que él aceptaba dinero de ellos.

translation.en: Apparently, it's been happening since Franny was born.
translation.es: Al parecer, pasaba desde que nació Franny.

translation.en: Moving's expensive, too.
I know, but you can get a lot for a little up there.
translation.es: Pero se consigue más con poco allá, y se supone que es muy bonito.

translation.en: - It's supposedly really pretty. - Yeah, I've driven through there.
translation.es: Pero se consigue más con poco allá, y se supone que es muy bonito. Sí, conozco la zona.

translation.en: Rich horsey weekenders and lots of full- time rednecks.
translation.es: Jinetes ricos que van de paseo y muchos pueblerinos.

translation.en: I know, but George has made some big sacrifices for me,
translation.es: Lo sé, pero George hizo grandes sacrificios por mí,

translation.en: and I-- I owe it to him to at least try.
translation.es: así que, al menos, debo intentarlo.

translation.en: Hey.
Hey.
I think I've found the perfect house for us.
translation.es: Creo que encontré la casa perfecta.

translation.en: - - Oh, there we are.
This lock is a bit tricky.
- Wow, beautiful. -
- Okay. - Huh?
As I told George last week, it's from the late 1800s.
translation.es: Como le dije a George la semana pasada, es de finales del siglo XIX.

translation.en: There's definitely updating that needs to be done.
Yes, certainly could use a paint job.
translation.es: Sí, le vendría bien una mano de pintura.

translation.en: Yeah, but look at these bones, huh? Amazing!
translation.es: Sí, pero mira la estructura. ¡Es increíble!

translation.en: You have to have a real vision for an old place like this.
translation.es: Hay que tener una visión real para un lugar así.

translation.en: Well, my wife is a trained art restorer, so we're in good hands.
translation.es: Bueno, mi esposa es restauradora de arte. Estamos en buenas manos.

translation.en: Why would someone just leave this here?
This is so beautiful.
Dairy farmers everywhere are falling on hard times.
translation.es: Los productores lácteos atraviesan una mala racha.

translation.en: - It's a-- a tough business these days. -
So sad.
It is sad.
We'll make it happy.
You wanna see the rest, don't you? Come on.
Show it to me.
- Show me the upstairs. - Okay, upstairs.
translation.es: - Muéstrame el piso de arriba. - Bien, subamos.

translation.en: How big is it?
Hey. Remember this?
I'm not gonna use all this space for it.
- Here. This is right… - Okay.
Hey, uh, George,
I was gonna put your little seascapes, you know, above the piano, - but I-- I can't find them. - Oh.
translation.es: iba a poner tus paisajes marinos sobre el piano, pero no los encuentro.

translation.en: - Sorry. I packed them for my office. - Aw.
translation.es: Lo siento. Los empaqué para mi oficina.

translation.en: I love those things.
Yeah, I thought it would show off a relic of my former life. Oh!
translation.es: Pensé que serviría para alardear de mi vida anterior.

translation.en: You know, maybe this house is going to inspire you to start painting again.
translation.es: Tal vez esta casa te inspire a volver a pintar.

translation.en: Mm, nah, I think, since my dissertation, I… I really see myself as a writer.
translation.es: No. Desde que hice la tesis, me veo más escribiendo.

translation.en: Okay, the cat or the doll? Which one?
I think she's finally out.
translation.es: Creo que por fin se durmió.

translation.en: Are you stressed about tomorrow?
Yeah-- No. Should I be?
Well, first day jitters are a normal human reaction.
translation.es: Los nervios del primer día son una reacción humana normal.

translation.en: Are you looking for a reason to de- stress?
- Do I need a reason? - No.
How do you want me to de- stress you?
What?
What is that smell?
You smell that? It smells like car exhaust fumes.
- Right? - Yeah, I… I guess I smell… smell it.
And it's getting stronger.
translation.es: Y es cada vez más fuerte.

translation.en: Do you think ghosts use premium unleaded?
I'm serious, George. Stop.
- Mommy, Mommy, I'm scared! - Oh God! It's okay. Oh!
translation.es: Mami, ¡tengo miedo! - Está bien. Ven aquí. - ¡Tengo miedo!

translation.en: - Come here. - I'm scared!
- Tuck in, baby girl. All right. -
Wait, really?
Mommy, I'm scared. I don't wanna sleep in there.
translation.es: Mami, tengo miedo. No quiero dormir allá.

translation.en: America's Rhine.
Oh, it is a dream setting for a campus.
translation.es: Es un escenario de ensueño para un campus.

translation.en: Full disclosure, Claire.
Your chapter on how Swedenborg influenced the art of George Inness
translation.es: Tu capítulo sobre cómo Swedenborg influyó en el arte de George Inness

translation.en: is what landed you here.
Swedenborg, really? That's… that's interesting.
It's the part of my dissertation I struggled with the most.
translation.es: Es la parte de la tesis que más me costó.

translation.en: How so?
Uh, I- I guess I'm a bit of a cliché, the New York cynic.
translation.es: Supongo que soy un cliché, un cínico de Nueva York.

translation.en: That… How a- a painter as brilliant as Inness
translation.es: Saber que un pintor tan brillante como Inness

translation.en: could fall for some 18th- century mystic still baffles me.
translation.es: cayó en una mística del siglo XVIII es algo que me desconcierta.

translation.en: Well, Swedenborg…
He wasn't just some mystic.
He keenly understood that everything in the natural world
translation.es: Comprendía que cada cosa que existe en el mundo natural

translation.en: has a counterpart in the spiritual realm.
translation.es: tiene un equivalente en el reino espiritual.

translation.en: And Inness painted landscapes with this in mind.
translation.es: E Inness pintó paisajes con eso en mente.

translation.en: I- I get that.
Oh, this is my office in case you need me.
translation.es: Mi oficina, por si me necesitas.

translation.en: - Wow, beautiful. - Mh- hm.
My-- my trouble with Swedenborg is his communicating with angels and ghosts.
translation.es: Mi problema con Swedenborg es que se comunica con ángeles y fantasmas.

translation.en: Glorifying death as this… as this grand passage.
translation.es: Glorifica a la muerte como un gran paso.

translation.en: You should know that Swedenborg still has a devoted following
translation.es: Te aviso que Swedenborg tiene seguidores devotos en estos pagos,

translation.en: in this neck of the woods, myself included.
translation.es: Te aviso que Swedenborg tiene seguidores devotos en estos pagos, entre los que me incluyo.

translation.en: We even have séances on occasion. I'll invite you.
translation.es: Tenemos sesiones espiritistas de vez en cuando. Te invitaré.

translation.en: I'll-- I will bring my wife.
She is the… the true believer of the family.
translation.es: Ella es la creyente de la familia.

translation.en: Well, this is your office right here.
translation.es: Esta de aquí es tu oficina.

translation.en: I guess I picked the wrong welcome gift.
translation.es: Creo que me equivoqué con el regalo de bienvenida.

translation.en: Well, I… I can't argue with the cover art.
translation.es: DE COSAS OÍDAS Y VISTAS No puedo objetar el arte de portada.

translation.en: The Valley of the Shadow of Death.
translation.es: El valle de la sombra de la muerte.

translation.en: Ahh, that is George Inness at his best.
translation.es: El valle de la sombra de la muerte. Una de las perlas de George Inness.

translation.en: Well, you are now officially in Inness territory.
translation.es: Ahora estás oficialmente en territorio Inness.

translation.en: Don't be surprised if you start seeing things his way.
translation.es: No te sorprendas si empiezas a ver las cosas como él.

translation.en: Thank you, Floyd.
- Hi. - Hello.
Mrs. Claire, right? Yeah, can I help you?
Uh, yes, ma'am.
My name's Eddie Lucks, and this here's my younger brother Cole.
translation.es: Me llamo Eddie Lucks, y él es mi hermano menor, Cole.

translation.en: We just wanted to introduce ourselves in case you're in need of a hired hand.
translation.es: Queríamos presentarnos por si necesitaban ayuda con algo.

translation.en: We do gardening, carpentry, plumbing.
When it comes to painting, we're regular Leonardos.
translation.es: Y para la pintura, somos unos Leonardos.

translation.en: - Best part of all is, we come real cheap. - Hey, like my marble?
translation.es: Lo mejor es que cobramos barato. ¿Te gusta?

translation.en: Yeah, nice. You want me to show you how to shoot?
translation.es: Sí, qué linda. ¿Te enseño a usarla?

translation.en: Oh, I forgot to mention that Cole is the best babysitter in town.
translation.es: Olvidé mencionar que Cole cuida niños como nadie.

translation.en: Yeah, I can see that. Where do you boys live?
In town with our uncle.
translation.es: En la ciudad, con un tío.

translation.en: We got plenty of references if that's what you need.
Okay. Do you have a business card?
- A card? Um… -
Let me see.
Oh, I left my business cards at home.
- I got a pen. - Yeah!
I think we should just hire them.
Shouldn't we get one more quote? There's a lot of other groundskeepers in town.
translation.es: ¿No deberíamos pedir un presupuesto más? Hay muchos jardineros.

translation.en: I already did, and they… run like half the price.
translation.es: Ya pregunté, ellos cobran la mitad.

translation.en: Cath, please don't tell me you're back on the whole salads- only thing.
translation.es: Por favor, no me digas que volviste a las ensaladas.

translation.en: I ate a big lunch today.
What about the protein shakes the doctor recommended?
translation.es: ¿Y los batidos proteicos que recomendó el médico?

translation.en: I saw you skipped it this morning.
translation.es: Vi que te lo saltaste esta mañana.

translation.en: I am doing them at night now because it's easier on my stomach.
translation.es: Me los hago de noche porque me sienta mejor al estómago.

translation.en: - Franny, you want some more rice? - No, I want a pony ride.
translation.es: - Franny, ¿quieres más arroz? - No, quiero un paseo en poni.

translation.en: - Go, pony, go! - I am.
Go, pony, go!
You are terrorizing.
Oh, look, there's another pony.
Okay. Ready?
- One, two, three. - Horsey.
- Pony! - Gosh.
- You coming? - Yeah, in a second. I have to do dishes.
translation.es: - ¿Vienes? - En un ratito. Voy a lavar los platos.

translation.en: Oh, can you get that pot for me, please?
- Thank you. I'll be up soon. - Okay.
Don't be long. I'm pretty tired.
Damned.
George.
Hey, George. George.
I'm a-- I'm asleep.
- Where? - Eight.
- Three pounds is a lot. - You've got to be telling--
translation.es: - Tres libras es mucho. - No, debes decirle…

translation.en: Company.
Hi. Are you the Historical Society?
Indeed we are.
Um, I don't know if you need volunteers,
but I'm new in town, and I would love to meet people
translation.es: pero soy recién llegada y quisiera conocer gente

translation.en: and possibly learn more about the area.
translation.es: y quizás aprender más sobre el área.

translation.en: Write your information down.
Okay.
We'll send you a schedule.
And also, I was curious
translation.es: Y también me preguntaba si tendrían información

translation.en: if you had any information on some of the older homes in the area,
translation.es: Y también me preguntaba si tendrían información sobre algunas de las casas más antiguas de la zona, ya que compré una.

translation.en: being that I just bought one.
translation.es: sobre algunas de las casas más antiguas de la zona, ya que compré una.

translation.en: Actually, there's a picture of your house hanging up.
translation.es: De hecho, hay colgada una foto de tu casa.

translation.en: - Really? Where? - Yeah.
In the other room. The couple who built it is in it, too.
translation.es: En la otra sala. Aparece la pareja que la construyó.

translation.en: The original ones, long before the Vayle family.
translation.es: Los originales, mucho antes de la familia Vayle.

translation.en: I… I'm going to go take a look. Thanks.
translation.es: Voy a echar un vistazo. Gracias.

translation.en: - He doesn't look like a cat. - He does.
translation.es: - No parece un gato. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: - His ears are so little. - It's called Cat in the Hat.
translation.es: - Se llama El gato garabato. - Tiene orejas pequeñas.

translation.en: - And his nose and stuff like that. - He's got a normal nose.
translation.es: - Y nariz y esas cosas. - Tiene una nariz normal.

translation.en: But it's so little!
You know he killed someone?
Over a game of tennis.
Who? Caravaggio.
Oh, well, I'm not surprised.
People get away with all kinds of horrible things.
translation.es: La gente sale impune de todo tipo de atrocidades.

translation.en: Are you speaking from personal experience?
So are you studying art? I- I teach over at Saginaw.
Oh God. No.
No, I was just… looking for T- shirt ideas.
I'm all about literature in school.
Which school?
Cornell.
Oh, that's quite a commute.
Just taking a little hiatus.
Riding for rich folk at Crow Hill Stables.
translation.es: Cabalgo para gente rica en el Establo de Crow Hill.

translation.en: Yeah, I know that place.
It's right next to the tennis club. I play there sometimes.
translation.es: Está junto al club de tenis donde a veces voy a jugar.

translation.en: Oh. Well, uh… I hope you're a better loser than Caravaggio.
translation.es: Bueno, espero que seas mejor perdedor que Caravaggio.

translation.en: George Claire.
Right.
Right. Claire.
Yeah, my friend Eddie does your yard work.
translation.es: Sí, mi amigo Eddie trabaja en tu jardín.

translation.en: I think your wife hired him.
translation.es: Creo que tu esposa lo contrató.

translation.en: Is that your little girl?
Yeah, that's Franny.
Hi there, Franny. How's that book?
What does this say?
Let's see.
Okay, it says…
He should not be here. He should not be about.
translation.es: No debería estar aquí. No debería estar cerca.

translation.en: He should not be here when your mother is out.
translation.es: No debería estar aquí si su madre está afuera.

translation.en: It's nice to meet you, Franny.
Okay, ready to go?
George?
George?
George, you're not going to believe the picture I just saw.
translation.es: No vas a creer la foto que vi.

translation.en: - Wanna go to the pond? - Yeah!
You wanna go swim?
- Come on, Franny. Gonna catch you! - No!
- I'm gonna throw you in! - No!
translation.es: - ¡Y te voy a arrojar al agua! - ¡No!

translation.en: Hey Franny, watch out for the snapping turtles, okay?
translation.es: Franny, cuidado, hay tortugas que muerden, ¿sí? - ¿En serio? - ¡Mi trasero! ¡Me mordió!

translation.en: All right? It's down my butt! It's got my butt!
- - Didn't they say summer's officially over?
translation.es: ¿No se suponía que el verano había terminado?

translation.en: Our seasons play by their own rules up here.
translation.es: Aquí las estaciones siguen sus propias reglas.

translation.en: Who knows? It could snow tomorrow.
Well, I brought some lemonade to help you guys cool off,
translation.es: Traje limonada para que se refrescaran,

translation.en: but it looks like you're way ahead of me.
translation.es: pero parece que se me adelantaron.

translation.en: You should come on in. The water's great.
translation.es: Debería meterse. El agua está agradable.

translation.en: Believe me,
it looks very tempting.
You know what they say about temptation. Easiest way to kill it's just to give in.
translation.es: Ya sabe lo que dicen de la tentación. El modo más fácil de liquidarla es ceder.

translation.en: So what does your uncle do?
translation.es: Y dime, ¿a qué se dedica su tío?

translation.en: He's a hearse driver.
I guess every town needs one of those.
Can I ask about your parents?
Um… both dead. Car accident.
translation.es: Fallecieron en un accidente de auto.

translation.en: Oh God, I'm so sorry.
Yeah, I mean, it was something.
translation.es: Sí, pero tiene su lado positivo.

translation.en: It makes a kid grow up fast.
Cole's on good track for college, though.
translation.es: Cole va encaminado para la universidad.

translation.en: And what about you?
Nah, that stuff's not really in my cards.
I mean, I did want to study music…
- Really? What instruments do you play? - …but…
All kinds. I-- I have a beat- up guitar right now.
translation.es: De todo tipo. Tengo una guitarra destartalada.

translation.en: We have a piano at the house. I just got it tuned.
translation.es: Hay un piano en casa. Acabo de afinarlo.

translation.en: It'd be nice to have someone who can actually play it. I'm pathetic.
translation.es: Sería lindo que alguien lo tocara. Yo soy pésima.

translation.en: All right. Well, thanks, Mrs. Claire.
- Catherine. Sorry. - It's okay.
You'll get used to it.
- - Yeah. Please do not tell him I said that.
translation.es: Por favor, no le digan que dije eso.

translation.en: All right.
Okay, so, the Hudson River School painters.
translation.es: Pintores de la escuela del río Hudson.

translation.en: Landscapes as the realm of the soul.
translation.es: Los paisajes son el reino del alma.

translation.en: If you keep reading around the subject, you'll find it really rewarding. Really.
translation.es: Si siguen leyendo sobre el tema, les será muy gratificante.

translation.en: - Keep going, okay? - Thank you so much.
- We will. - Bye!
George Claire?
Yes. Hello. Can I help you?
Justine Sokolov. Adjunct weaving instructor.
translation.es: Justine Sokolov. Monitora adjunta de tejido.

translation.en: You play tennis with my husband Bram.
translation.es: Juegas al tenis con mi esposo, Bram.

translation.en: Bram?
Oh, Bram, of course. Yes. He mentioned that his wife teaches here.
translation.es: Bram, claro, sí. Mencionó que su esposa enseñaba aquí.

translation.en: I hear you've developed a cult- like following already in our department.
translation.es: Oí que ya tienes un grupo de fans en nuestro departamento.

translation.en: So I… Oh, this you?
I thought I'd invite you and your wife over and see what all the fuss is about.
translation.es: Pensé en invitarlos a ti y a tu esposa para ver por qué tanto alboroto.

translation.en: That sounds really nice.
You know, it'd be nice for my wife to meet a few more Saginaw folk, too, so yeah.
translation.es: Le hará bien a mi esposa conocer a mis colegas, así que sí.

translation.en: Excellent. I have your number in the registry,
translation.es: Excelente. Tu número está en el registro. Llamaré a la señora esposa.

translation.en: so I'll give the missus a call.
translation.es: Tu número está en el registro. Llamaré a la señora esposa.

translation.en: - Fantastic. - George Claire.
Wow. You painted these?
Yeah, a long time ago.
I gave up the whole fine arts thing to focus on theory.
translation.es: Dejé la pintura para concentrarme en la teoría.

translation.en: Realized I wasn't really up to snuff.
I disagree.
These are confidently executed, and they are… quite unique.
translation.es: Se nota la confianza en la ejecución y son extraordinarias.

translation.en: Thank you.
Uh, you should see my wife's stuff. She's the real artist of the family.
translation.es: Deberías ver las obras de mi esposa. Ella es la artista.

translation.en: Okay, I look forward to it. I'll be in touch, George Claire.
translation.es: Bien, lo espero con ansias. Estamos en contacto, George Claire.

translation.en: What's wrong? That smell. It's-- it's getting stronger.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasa? - Ese olor. Es cada vez más fuerte.

translation.en: Yeah, I figured it out. It's 'cause we're above the garage.
translation.es: Sí, ya sé por qué. Es porque estamos sobre el garaje.

translation.en: I'll get some fans and air it out in the morning.
But why does it come and go?
Cath, please stop with the ghost stuff.
translation.es: Cath, por favor, no hay fantasmas.

translation.en: I'm not gonna let you put a negative spin on this house.
translation.es: No dejaré que le hagas mala fama a la casa.

translation.en: - Mommy, where are you? -
Mommy, I'm scared, I'm scared! - Mommy! - Hey, hey! Shh.
- What happened? - What is going on? Where were you?
- What happened? Tell me. - I saw the lady, Mommy. I'm scared.
translation.es: - Dime qué pasó. - Vi a la señora, mami. Tengo miedo.

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay. Don't worry.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Mamá está acá. Puedes dormir con nosotros.

translation.en: - Mommy's here. You can sleep with us. - Oh God. Cath, again?
translation.es: No te preocupes. Mamá está acá. Puedes dormir con nosotros. Cath, ¿otra vez?

translation.en: If we filled out her sedative prescription like the pediatrician said,
translation.es: Si usáramos la receta de sedantes como dijo el pediatra,

translation.en: this wouldn't keep happening.
I said to you ten times I don't feel good giving her unnecessary medications.
translation.es: Y yo te dije diez veces que no quiero darle medicamentos innecesarios.

translation.en: It's this house.
Oh God. You two sleep in there. I'll take Franny's room.
translation.es: Ustedes duerman ahí. Iré a la habitación de Franny.

translation.en: Daddy's mad at me.
No! No, no, no, he's not.
No, sweetheart. Not at you.
It's gotta feel good.
I guess, yeah.
Uh, guess who I ran into the other day?
translation.es: Adivina a quién vi el otro día.

translation.en: Who?
Your boss, George Claire.
- Oh, yeah? - Yeah.
I haven't met the guy officially yet.
translation.es: Aún no lo conozco en persona.

translation.en: What's he like?
Dishonest.
Deceitful.
How would you know that?
Because I found him attractive.
Here we go!
You wanna watch Eddie chop wood?
Yeah!
Chop.
Chop.
Chop.
All of us on Earth are associated
translation.es: Las personas de la Tierra estamos ligadas

translation.en: with those in the spiritual world who are like ourselves.
translation.es: a las del mundo espiritual que eran como nosotros.

translation.en: We are, in a sense, united to them.
translation.es: De cierta forma, estamos unidas a ellas.

translation.en: United to them…
- - What do you want?
What are you looking for here?
I… I don't really know.
You're a presumptuous fucker, aren't you?
If you're coming in, shut the door behind you.
He's got a social life at that school, and I'm isolated.
translation.es: Él tiene vida social en la universidad, y yo estoy aislada.

translation.en: Something's wrong. I can hear it in your voice.
translation.es: Algo está mal. Se te nota en la voz.

translation.en: I…
I'm starting… to see things.
And I'm scared to tell George about it.
translation.es: y tengo miedo de contarle a George.

translation.en: - Catherine, have you been eating? -
What's the church like up there? Have you prayed on any of this?
translation.es: ¿Cómo es la iglesia allá? ¿Rezaste por esto?

translation.en: Try to remember how he did right by marrying--
translation.es: Recuerda lo bien que hizo al casarse…

translation.en: Oh, I gotta go. Thanks a lot for the pep talk, Mom. I love you.
translation.es: Tengo que colgar. Gracias por la charla, mamá. Te amo.

translation.en: That was some run.
Yeah, I guess I went pretty far. I don't know what came over me.
translation.es: Sí, supongo que me alejé mucho. No sé qué me pasó.

translation.en: And then I- I got distracted by these wildflowers.
translation.es: Y luego me distraje con estas flores.

translation.en: Thanks, but now you're going to be late for class.
translation.es: Gracias, pero se te va a hacer tarde para tu clase.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I know. I- I'd better hustle.
translation.es: Sí, lo sé. Mejor me apuro.

translation.en: Look who's home.
Hey.
- What are you doing? - One sec.
Mr. Claire, right?
It's nice to finally meet you. I'm Eddie.
translation.es: Un placer conocerlo. Yo soy Eddie.

translation.en: - My brother and I are about to get-- - The Vayle boys, aren't you?
translation.es: - Mi hermano y yo vamos a… - Son los chicos Vayle, ¿no?

translation.en: Not anymore, sir.
We go by Lucks now. Took our uncle's last name.
translation.es: Ahora somos Lucks. Tomamos el apellido de nuestro tío.

translation.en: Do me a favor. My… my wife doesn't know that you lived here. Uh, or what happened.
translation.es: Hazme un favor. Mi esposa no sabe que vivieron aquí ni lo que pasó.

translation.en: I think it would be better if we kept it that way.
Uh, she's a nervous woman and, uh…
well, she wouldn't want you around if she found out.
translation.es: y no los querría cerca si se enterara.

translation.en: Sure, Mr. Claire.
My brother and I are only here for honest work. Thank you. I appreciate it.
translation.es: - Solo venimos por trabajo honrado. - Te lo agradezco.

translation.en: It seems a… little odd, no?
That you'd want to be here at all.
Taking care of this house comes second nature to us.
translation.es: Cuidar esta casa nos resulta natural.

translation.en: Right.
Did you meet your husband in art school?
Yeah, we were undergrads together.
That's cool.
Were your parents supportive of you studying music?
translation.es: ¿Tus padres te apoyaron con la música?

translation.en: Yeah, my mom was the one who taught me.
translation.es: Sí, mi mamá fue la que me enseñó.

translation.en: But when my father found my application, he, uh… he beat me with a two- by- four.
translation.es: Pero, cuando mi padre vio la solicitud, me golpeó con una tabla.

translation.en: Are you serious?
Yeah.
Yeah, he actually bloodied me up pretty good.
Well, if you decide to reapply to music school,
I will personally write you a check for your application.
translation.es: yo misma te escribiré un cheque para tu solicitud.

translation.en: You really got me.
- Hey, George. -
Eddie-- Eddie was just playing his favorite Louis Armstrong song for me.
translation.es: Eddie estaba tocando su canción favorita de Louis Armstrong.

translation.en: - Called-- What's it called? - Someday You'll Be Sorry.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo se llama? - Algún día te arrepentirás.

translation.en: That's right. That's the story of my life.
translation.es: Cierto. La historia de mi vida.

translation.en: What a surprise.
Eddie was telling me earlier how he was here for honest work.
translation.es: Eddie me dijo antes que venía por trabajo honrado.

translation.en: I-- I didn't realize that it included entertainment.
translation.es: No pensé que eso incluyera entretenimiento.

translation.en: We finished painting, sir,
and, uh, Mrs. Claire asked me to play something before I left.
translation.es: y la señora Claire me pidió que tocara algo antes de irme.

translation.en: - So-- - Wait, Eddie, Eddie.
Come on, please. Don't stop on my account.
translation.es: No, por favor. No pares por mí.

translation.en: I've been called many things before, but never a party pooper.
translation.es: Me han llamado muchas cosas, pero nunca aguafiestas.

translation.en: Well, the man of the house has spoken,
translation.es: El hombre de la casa ha hablado,

translation.en: so finish the goddamn song, Eddie.
translation.es: así que termina la maldita canción, Eddie.

translation.en: Yeah, please.
Shit.
Oh God.
- Catherine. -
What you do to me, you do not know.
translation.es: Lo que me haces no tiene nombre.

translation.en: My God.
I've never done anything like this before, you know.
What's wrong?
What? I'm just talking.
- Sharing. - What the fuck is wrong with me?
translation.es: Comparto. ¿Qué mierda me pasa? ¿Por qué sigo haciendo esto?

translation.en: - Why do I keep doing this? - Hey, Willis, I'm being serious.
translation.es: ¿Qué mierda me pasa? ¿Por qué sigo haciendo esto? Willis, hablo en serio. Me gustaría conocerte más.

translation.en: It'd be nice to know you a bit better.
translation.es: Willis, hablo en serio. Me gustaría conocerte más.

translation.en: Some ordinary, regular things.
That's not what this is about.
Ow! What the hell?
You think because I fuck you, I'm fooled by you?
translation.es: ¿Te crees que, porque te cojo, me dejo engañar?

translation.en: I've been around guys like you my whole life.
translation.es: Toda la vida me han rodeado tipos como tú.

translation.en: - What the hell are you talking about? - My dad made a fortune defending them.
translation.es: ¿De qué hablas? Mi papá hizo una fortuna defendiéndolos: ladrones, estafadores, psicópatas.

translation.en: Thieves, con men, psychopaths.
translation.es: Mi papá hizo una fortuna defendiéndolos: ladrones, estafadores, psicópatas.

translation.en: And they all got off because that's the way the world works for men.
translation.es: Todos se salen con la suya porque así funciona el mundo para los hombres.

translation.en: Okay, look, I see that you have some pretty awful ideas about men.
translation.es: Bien, veo que tienes una idea horrible de los hombres.

translation.en: I have awful ideas about everything.
Now get the fuck up.
- Come on, Willis. - No.
I'm done with this.
Willis! Willis!
Willis!
- Hi! - Trick or treat?
- Come in, come in. - Hello, I'm Catherine.
- Oh, of course you are. Mmm. - Oh.
George, hi.
- Hi. For you. - Oh, thank you.
Bram, where are you? The Claires have arrived.
translation.es: Bram, cariño, ¿dónde estás? Llegaron los Claire.

translation.en: - Wow. - I'm here.  Amazing.
- Thanks. - Hello.
- I'm Catherine. - Hey, Bram.
- Thanks for having us. - Look what they brought us.
translation.es: - Gracias por invitarnos. - Mira qué trajeron.

translation.en: - Thank you. How are you? - Very well.
- Come on in. - Beautiful.
- Thank you. - I love your artwork.
Ah. Well, yes. We're just enjoying our tenure here while it lasts.
translation.es: Bueno, tratamos de disfrutar nuestra estadía aquí.

translation.en: - Oh, do you rent? - No, no, no.
He just means how these old Hudson Valley homes are.
translation.es: Lo dice por cómo son las casas antiguas del valle de Hudson.

translation.en: We think we own them, we're just caretakers.
translation.es: Nos creemos los dueños, pero solo somos cuidadores.

translation.en: They outlive us all.
My wife thinks ours is haunted.
translation.es: Mi esposa cree que la nuestra está embrujada.

translation.en: - Well, she's probably right. - They're all haunted a bit.
translation.es: Probablemente, tenga razón. Todas están embrujadas.

translation.en: After all, we're in Headless Horseman country.
translation.es: Estamos en la tierra del jinete sin cabeza.

translation.en: Let me take your coats.
Oh, actually, we should go outside and look at the alpacas before they nap.
translation.es: De hecho, podríamos ir a mirar las alpacas antes de su siesta.

translation.en: - Oh, yes. - This way.
- You'll love it. - Alpacas nap?
Where does one buy such quality weed up here?
translation.es: ¿Dónde se compra esta hierba de calidad?

translation.en: - Buy? I grow it. - Nice.
You know, I came up here to write the Great American Novel, but…
translation.es: Vine a escribir la gran novela estadounidense, pero paso la mayor parte del tiempo atendiendo mi jardín, si me entiendes.

translation.en: I spend most of my time tending to my garden, if you get my drift.
translation.es: pero paso la mayor parte del tiempo atendiendo mi jardín, si me entiendes.

translation.en: I love your setup. It's amazing.
- Aww, thank you. - And your work is so unique.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Y tu trabajo es fantástico.

translation.en: Thanks. It's gonna sound a little strange,
but it's a spiritual thing for me, weaving.
translation.es: pero, para mí, tejer es algo espiritual.

translation.en: I tap into something cosmic when I'm working.
translation.es: Me conecto con algo cósmico cuando trabajo.

translation.en: - Its patterns, you know? - Yeah. Sometimes I feel guilty taking credit for it.
translation.es: Los patrones. A veces me da culpa incluso adjudicarme la obra.

translation.en: Why? You shouldn't.
I would love for you to make something for my Franny.
translation.es: Me encantaría que le hicieras algo a Franny.

translation.en: - I'd pay you, naturally. - Don't be silly. I'll do it for cost.
translation.es: - Pagaría. - No seas tonta. Lo haré al costo.

translation.en: Oh, actually, George already asked for a scarf for his mother,
translation.es: De hecho, George ya pidió una bufanda para su madre,

translation.en: so I'll just add it to that order.
translation.es: así que lo agregaré a esa orden.

translation.en: Okay.
- You guys just have the one child? - Yeah. Yes.
translation.es: - ¿Tienen una hija nada más? - Sí. Tiene cuatro años.

translation.en: She's four. And you and Bram? Do you guys have kids?
translation.es: - ¿Tienen una hija nada más? - Sí. Tiene cuatro años. ¿Tienen hijos con Bram?

translation.en: No.
Bram and I were conflicted about that for a while,
translation.es: Bram y yo estuvimos en conflicto por eso un tiempo.

translation.en: and then Mother Nature made the final decision.
translation.es: Luego la madre naturaleza tomó la decisión final.

translation.en: And she made the right one.
It all worked out perfectly.
I was conflicted, too, but just like that, it… It happened.
translation.es: Yo también estaba en conflicto, pero sucedió así como así.

translation.en: And then we got married, which I was also conflicted about.
translation.es: Y luego nos casamos, eso también me generó conflicto.

translation.en: I guess you could say I'm a conflicted Catholic girl at heart,
translation.es: Se podría decir que soy una católica conflictuada

translation.en: dutifully going through the motions.
translation.es: que cumple diligentemente con su deber.

translation.en: You know,
the first few years of our marriage
translation.es: Los primeros años de nuestro matrimonio

translation.en: were a complete blur because of the baby and school.
translation.es: fueron una nebulosa por la beba y la universidad.

translation.en: We're really still trying to catch our breath up here.
You know, I attend this women's group.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Me junto con un grupo de mujeres.

translation.en: It's an Arts Club… thing.
translation.es: Es como un club de arte.

translation.en: We meet once a month up in Albany,
translation.es: Nos reunimos una vez al mes en Albany.

translation.en: and there are so many creative ladies to meet, Catherine.
translation.es: Nos reunimos una vez al mes en Albany. Hay tantas mujeres creativas, Catherine.

translation.en: I think you should come with me.
I would love something like that.
I don't know anybody up here.
Well, you do now.
It must be so nice to inherit a fortune
translation.es: Debe ser muy satisfactorio heredar una fortuna

translation.en: and then spend all day not writing a book.
translation.es: y luego pasarte el día entero no escribiendo un libro.

translation.en: I really like them, especially her. She's so interesting.
translation.es: Me agradan mucho, especialmente ella. Es muy interesante.

translation.en: She's so free with herself and her body.
translation.es: Es muy despreocupada con su personalidad y con su cuerpo.

translation.en: She can certainly put away some lasagna.
translation.es: Comió su buena porción de lasaña.

translation.en: - That's a nasty thing to say. - Come on, I'm kidding.
translation.es: Qué horrible comentario. Es broma. A mí también me agradan.

translation.en: I like them, too.
translation.es: Es broma. A mí también me agradan.

translation.en: I especially like…
…Bram's weed.
Are you sure you're okay to drive after smoking so much?
translation.es: ¿Seguro puedes conducir después de fumar tanto?

translation.en: Yeah.
- I'm fine. I'm more than okay. - Really?
translation.es: - Estoy bien. Más que bien. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: - Watch this. -
George, slow down.
- Slow down, George. - Really? - Really? - George, slow down!
Slow down!
- Stop, George! - Whoo!
God, what the hell are you doing?
What? What, I'm just having a little fun.
You remember what that was like, Cath, huh?
- That's not funny! - Come on.
Oh, come on, Cath. Cath!
Catherine!
Cath, where are you going? Come on, get back in the car.
translation.es: Catherine, ¿a dónde vas? Vamos, vuelve al auto.

translation.en: - Cath! - Get your hands off me!
God, we are two smart people.
- We should've known better. - Known what?
translation.es: Somos inteligentes. Deberíamos haberlo sabido. ¿Qué cosa?

translation.en: That I'm only here for the imaginary book jacket bio that you have in your fucking head.
translation.es: Que solo vine por esa biografía imaginaria que tienes fija en la cabeza.

translation.en: The-- the-- the professor with the wife and the country home.
translation.es: El profesor con la esposa y la casa de campo.

translation.en: I gave up everything for you!
Oh God, I'm so sorry.  I'm so sorry I fucked up both of our lives!
translation.es: Dios, lamento habernos arruinado la vida.

translation.en: And the worst part is this is all I have.
translation.es: Y lo peor es que esto es todo lo que tengo.

translation.en: Cath, you know what you do have? Is the crying drunks.
translation.es: Cath, ¿sabes qué tienes? Llanto de borrachera.

translation.en: You are a person who should not drink alcohol,
translation.es: Eres una persona que no debería beber alcohol,

translation.en: especially when you do not fucking eat anything!
translation.es: sobre todo, si no comes nada.

translation.en: Oh my God. I am so sick of everybody blaming everything
translation.es: ¡Estoy harta de que todos piensen que todo lo que pasa en mi puta vida

translation.en: in my fucking life on me not eating!
translation.es: ¡Estoy harta de que todos piensen que todo lo que pasa en mi puta vida es por culpa de que no coma!

translation.en: Please, get back in the goddamn car!
translation.es: Por favor, vuelve al maldito auto.

translation.en: - Get off of me! - Ow!
Fuck!
- - Oh my God. Cath?
Oh my God. Cath…
I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry. Was that…
Did I… Did I…
Cath?
Cath, are you okay?
Come on, Cole. Get up. I'll drive you home.
translation.es: Vamos, Cole. Te llevo a tu casa.

translation.en: Hey, Cath?
I didn't mean to hurt you.
I would never hurt you.
But I also…
I have not been sensitive to your needs for some time.
translation.es: no estuve muy atento a tus necesidades últimamente.

translation.en: And for that, I owe you an apology.
translation.es: Y por eso, te debo una disculpa.

translation.en: More than an apology.
One thing I do know…
…is I love you.
- - What was that?
Oh God. Jesus. What?
It's okay, baby.
Nothing happened. It's okay. It's okay.
We look at each other, and we are not ashamed.
translation.es: Nos miramos entre nosotras y no sentimos vergüenza.

translation.en: I wearing the face of the proper marriage,
translation.es: Yo, con la máscara de un matrimonio apropiado,

translation.en: you the face of the independent woman.
translation.es: tú, con la cara de la mujer independiente.

translation.en: We cleaved to each other across that space.
translation.es: Nos aferramos la una a la otra en ese espacio.

translation.en: You're back later than I thought. Am I?
translation.es: - Regresaste más tarde de lo que pensaba. - ¿Sí?

translation.en: The fridge is empty.
I can go out, pick up some food for us.
- What do you feel like? - I, uh… I ate with Justine.
Brilliant setting for a faculty meeting, Floyd.
translation.es: PUERTO DE SAGINAW Gran locación para una reunión de profesores, Floyd.

translation.en: Yes. I take her out alone a lot, which would seem selfish.
translation.es: Sí. Salgo mucho solo, me pareció egoísta.

translation.en: I used to sail a bit myself. Grew up on the Connecticut coast.
translation.es: Solía navegar un poco. Crecí en la costa de Connecticut.

translation.en: Oh, that's right. Do your family own a boat?
I inherited my cousin's. The Lost Horizon.
translation.es: Heredé el de mi primo, Horizonte perdido.

translation.en: He actually drowned while sailing it.
translation.es: De hecho, se ahogó mientras navegaba.

translation.en: Oh, how sad.
Yeah. Only 19.
- Mm. - Already so sophisticated.
I remember when he died.
I stole his diary after the funeral. Read it repeatedly.
translation.es: Robé su diario después del funeral. Lo leí varias veces.

translation.en: I know it's-- it's an awful thing to do,
but I… I think I needed some sort of… connection.
translation.es: pero creo que necesitaba algún tipo de conexión.

translation.en: Did you learn anything from it?
Yeah, a little.
He was gay, unhappy.
Typical tortured artist.
And then all that angst one unfortunate moment vanishes forever.
translation.es: Y luego toda esa angustia desaparece en un momento desafortunado.

translation.en: We're all so inconsequential, Floyd.
Swedenborg would suggest otherwise.
He'd say death is only the beginning.
translation.es: Decía que la muerte es solo el comienzo.

translation.en: Have you read the book yet?
It's on the top of my list.
- Come, come in. - Ahh. Cath?
Let me get that.
Hello.
Oh, Catherine, this is Floyd DeBeers, head of our department.
translation.es: Cath, Floyd DeBeers, jefe de nuestro departamento.

translation.en: He also took me on this magnificent boat ride.
translation.es: Me llevó a pasear en velero hoy.

translation.en: So good to meet you.
So, in return, I invited him to our house, a very unfair trade.
translation.es: A cambio, lo invité a nuestra casa, un trato muy injusto.

translation.en: - I've heard wonderful things about you. - As I have you.
translation.es: - Escuché maravillas de usted. - Lo mismo digo.

translation.en: George, is this some kind of setup?
What?
I-- I swear to God, I didn't even tell her you were coming.
translation.es: Juro por Dios que ni siquiera le dije que vendrías.

translation.en: You see, George? You see? There are no coincidences.
I'm sorry. I-- I was taken by the artwork and just started reading it.
translation.es: Perdón. Me atrapó el arte de portada y comencé a leerlo.

translation.en: Nothing to be sorry for.
You do know what this is, don't you? The cover art?
It's a soul transitioning into the afterlife.
translation.es: Es un alma en transición al más allá.

translation.en: Really?
The painter followed Swedenborg,
so he believed that death is parallel to birth, but divine.
translation.es: Creía que la muerte es paralela al nacimiento, pero divina.

translation.en: Floyd, believe me.
You do not want to get my wife started on all that, uh, stuff.
translation.es: No es buena idea que mi esposa empiece con todo esto.

translation.en: Uh, Cath, please show Floyd around.
translation.es: Cath, por favor, muéstrale la casa.

translation.en: Um, I'm gonna fix us some cocktails.
May I show you around?
- I can't wait. - Great.
My daughter's asleep already, but you can-- we can peek in her room.
translation.es: Mi hija ya se durmió, pero podemos espiar su habitación.

translation.en: We actually have four bedrooms, but we only use two of them.
translation.es: Tenemos cuatro habitaciones, pero solo usamos dos.

translation.en: A young couple can't have too many bed--
translation.es: Una pareja joven nunca tiene demasiadas…

translation.en: You okay?
We're not alone, are we?
What do you mean?
She doesn't mean any harm.
She has reasons for lingering.
I've seen her, and so has my daughter.
translation.es: La he visto, y mi hija también.

translation.en: Because she's here for you.
- She wants you to know that. -
At first, I was terrified,
translation.es: Al principio, estaba aterrada, es lógico,

translation.en: of course, but now…
translation.es: Al principio, estaba aterrada, es lógico, pero ahora…

translation.en: every time I sense her, I-- I feel…
translation.es: cada vez que la percibo, siento…

translation.en: comfort.
- I know that doesn't make any sense. - It makes perfect sense.
translation.es: - Sé que no tiene sentido. - Tiene todo el sentido.

translation.en: Her name is Smit, wife of Jacob Smit.
translation.es: Se llama Smit, esposa de Jacob Smit.

translation.en: He was a… um, a local minister.
They built this house, and that's all I can find at the library.
translation.es: Construyeron esta casa. Es todo lo que averigüé en la biblioteca.

translation.en: Let me do some digging on campus.
You can't tell George because he can't know. He thinks that I'm crazy.
translation.es: No le digas a George. No puede saber. Me trata de loca.

translation.en: No, of course not.
He's just afraid, you know.
Men at his stage of life often are.
translation.es: Les pasa a menudo a los hombres de su edad.

translation.en: But try and be patient, Catherine.
With love, he can catch up to you spiritually.
And let us… Let us hold a séance here.
translation.es: Y hagamos una sesión de espiritismo.

translation.en: - With or without George. - Really?
We can find out a little more about your housemate.
translation.es: Podemos averiguar un poco más sobre tu huésped.

translation.en: Bye, Floyd.
Good night, good night, and thanks for a wonderful evening.
translation.es: Buenas noches y gracias por una velada maravillosa.

translation.en: Drive safe.
My God, Cath, he absolutely adored you.
I-- I have never seen Floyd light up like that around anyone.
translation.es: Nunca vi que Floyd se iluminara así con nadie.

translation.en: And you were up there awhile. Did he say anything?
translation.es: Y hablaron un buen rato a solas. ¿Te dijo algo?

translation.en: About what?
About me?
He said that you were an exceptional professor.
translation.es: Dijo que eras un profesor excepcional.

translation.en: And you are an exceptional wife,
translation.es: Y tú eres una esposa excepcional.

translation.en: which means the world to me.
translation.es: Eres lo más importante en mi vida.

translation.en: Ah! I feel like having company was good for us.
translation.es: Siento que recibir visitas nos hizo bien.

translation.en: Yeah? We need this.
I, uh… I want to invite my whole department over.
translation.es: Quiero invitar a todo mi departamento.

translation.en: A-- a real party. What do you think?
I think we owe it to Franny to make this place a happy home.
translation.es: Pienso que tenemos la obligación de crear un hogar feliz para Franny.

translation.en: I'm not against it. I just think that we need to then also invite
translation.es: No me opongo, pero, en ese caso, también deberíamos invitar a otras personas y a nuestros vecinos.

translation.en: the locals and our neighbors.
translation.es: también deberíamos invitar a otras personas y a nuestros vecinos.

translation.en: Neighbors?  Really?
I need to feel like I'm in this community, George, not just your community.
translation.es: Quiero sentir que estoy en esta comunidad, no solo en tu comunidad.

translation.en: Okay, let's do it.
Please tell me again why I'm carrying a Bundt cake.
translation.es: Repíteme por qué traigo un pastel con forma de dona.

translation.en: We're no good at parties. Speak for yourself.
translation.es: - No nos gustan las fiestas. - Habla por ti.

translation.en: I am. Nobody wants the sheriff around when they're drunk.
translation.es: Eso hago. Nadie quiere al sheriff cerca cuando está ebrio.

translation.en: Uh, more wine?
Hi. Wine?
A little. Just… just…
Oh! Okay, good.
She's a friend of Bram's.
She's also writing.
They both have been writing novels… Sorry. They both have been writing novels.
translation.es: Sí. Ambos escribieron novelas. Lo siento. Ambos escribieron para…

translation.en: I first wore glasses when I was 13.
translation.es: Empecé a usar lentes a los 13 años.

translation.en: Oh, thank you. Thank you, young man.
Yes. You've done a lot with this place.
translation.es: Sí. Quedó muy bien la casa.

translation.en: I want you to meet my wife Millicent, the love of my life.
translation.es: Te presento a mi esposa, Millicent, el amor de mi vida.

translation.en: It's incredibly nice to meet you.
I hear we might have a session in your home.
translation.es: Oí que quizás hagamos una sesión en tu casa.

translation.en: Yeah, soon, I hope. Thank you.
George? Travis, Mare's husband.
- A pleasure to meet you. - This is her best cake.
translation.es: - Mucho gusto. - Preparó su mejor pastel.

translation.en: Thank you. We'll put it right here.
Travis? Come here. You've got to hear this.
Yes, dear.
Hm. I almost baked a cake.
Bram insisted there was something you might appreciate… even more.
translation.es: Bram insistió en que había otra cosa que podrías apreciar más.

translation.en: Oh, fantastic.
- - Um, shall we?
- Yeah. Why not? - Why not?
- This place looks marvelous, Catherine. - Thank you.
translation.es: - La casa quedó maravillosa, Catherine. - Gracias.

translation.en: Absolutely transformed.
Well, a little paint goes a really long way.
translation.es: Bueno, un poco de pintura ayuda mucho.

translation.en: And it does my heart good to see Eddie and Cole here.
translation.es: Y me hace bien ver a Eddie y Cole aquí. Eres una santa por recibirlos.

translation.en: - You're a saint for having them back. - What do you mean?
translation.es: Y me hace bien ver a Eddie y Cole aquí. Eres una santa por recibirlos. ¿Por qué lo dices?

translation.en: Well, they grew up here.
You-- you knew that, didn't you?
I- I- It's just that I told George the whole story when I first showed him the house and--
translation.es: Es que le conté a George toda la historia cuando le mostré la casa y…

translation.en: What story?
I suppose he-- he didn't wanna upset you.
translation.es: Supongo que quiso evitarte el mal trago.

translation.en: - I-- I'm going to go find Travis. - No, no, no. What story, Mare?
translation.es: - Iré a buscar a Travis. - No. ¿Qué historia, Mare?

translation.en: He didn't tell you anything about their parents?
translation.es: ¿No te dijo nada de sus padres?

translation.en: Well… it's just that…
Dear Ella, she was a friend of mine, you know, and… and…
translation.es: Ella era una querida amiga mía…

translation.en: Sometimes, I can't help but believe that she…
translation.es: y a veces no puedo evitar pensar que…

translation.en: She's free now.
And-- and I know he struggled financially,
translation.es: Sé que él tenía dificultades económicas,

translation.en: but that horrible man was cruel in-- in ways that you could never know.
translation.es: pero ese hombre era cruel en formas inimaginables.

translation.en: What happened to them?
Catherine, it's not the time. I don't want to ruin your party.
translation.es: No es el momento. No quiero arruinar la fiesta.

translation.en: No, no.
Mare, I'm begging you. I need to know this.
translation.es: Mare, te lo ruego, necesito saber.

translation.en: All right.
The way I… I heard it
was that…
Calvin Vayle slipped Ella and the boys a sedative one night.
translation.es: Calvin Vayle sedó a hurtadillas a Ella y los niños.

translation.en: And… when they were out cold, he…
He went outside and shot every one of the cows they owned.
translation.es: salió y les disparó a todas las vacas que tenían.

translation.en: Oh my God.
And then, when he was finished, he went into the garage below their…
translation.es: Y luego, cuando terminó, bajó al garaje, debajo de su habitación,

translation.en: bedroom,
started the ignition of two trucks and closed the windows.
translation.es: encendió el motor de dos camionetas y cerró las ventanas.

translation.en: The fumes.
Then he went up and…
laid down in bed with Ella until--
translation.es: y se acostó con Ella hasta que…

translation.en: - Oh my God, I was wrong. - They never woke up.
I had the wrong wife.
- Wrong about what? - Your friend Ella. She's here, Mare.
translation.es: - ¿En qué te equivocaste? - Tu amiga Ella está aquí.

translation.en: Oh my God. Where did you get this?
Wh- what are you doing with this? She never took this ring off.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces con esto? Nunca se quitaba el anillo.

translation.en: You know what?
I've been in this house for three months, and nobody has said anything to me.
translation.es: Llevo tres meses en esta casa. Nadie me ha dicho nada.

translation.en: Not the mailman, not a neighbor, not-- not the bank teller.
translation.es: Ni el cartero, ni los vecinos, ni el cajero del banco.

translation.en: God, I'm such a fool!
No, no, it's not like that.
- Oh my God! - Catherine, we're from farm stock up here.
It's-- it's not our way to get involved with people's personal business.
translation.es: No nos gusta meternos en asuntos personales ajenos.

translation.en: You've made this home so warm and inviting,
translation.es: Lo transformaste en un hogar cálido y acogedor.

translation.en: and everyone's moved on so well. I'm sure that George didn't mean--
translation.es: Y todos siguieron con su vida. De seguro George no quiso…

translation.en: Do not waste any of your time on George, Mare.
translation.es: No lo justifiques a George, Mare.

translation.en: George Claire always gets exactly what he wants.
translation.es: George Claire siempre consigue lo que quiere.

translation.en: You don't know anything about me.
I do.
I know you're a weaver of fabrics.
And ideas.
Like the ideas you've been putting in my wife's head lately.
translation.es: Como las ideas que le metiste a mi esposa.

translation.en: Okay.
Here's something about me you don't know.
translation.es: Te diré algo de mí que no sabes.

translation.en: I get suspicious when students worship their professors.
translation.es: Desconfío cuando los estudiantes adoran a sus profesores.

translation.en: Always leads to trouble.
Is that a dig or advice?
Oh, it's just honesty. You know, like the Good Book says.
translation.es: Solo es honestidad, como dice la Biblia.

translation.en: The truth will set you free.
I don't know about that.
translation.es: No estoy tan seguro de eso.

translation.en: People really don't want the truth, and they certainly don't want to be set free.
translation.es: La gente no quiere la verdad y no quiere que la liberen.

translation.en: What? Says who?
The Eagles, remember?
- Hotel California. -
Yeah. We, uh-- we all choose our own prison.
translation.es: Sí. Todos elegimos nuestra propia prisión.

translation.en: Here, give me your hands.
I'll show you why they're right. Here.
translation.es: Te mostraré por qué tienen razón.

translation.en: - You're going to read my palms now? - Come on.
translation.es: - ¿Me vas a leer las manos? - Anda.

translation.en: Okay.
Now,
try to get yourself free.
Okay, that's enough. You can let go now, George.
translation.es: Bien, suficiente. Ya puedes soltarme, George.

translation.en: Yeah, I know I can, but are you sure you really want me to?
translation.es: Sé que puedo, pero ¿de verdad quieres que lo haga?

translation.en: - I'm very sure. - Oh.
George, you-- you are hurting me now.
Let go!
W- what?
- - Jesus Christ, George.
Hotel California, Justine.
Hotel California!
Good night.
- Drive safe. -
Well,
that was a success, huh?
Your friend Justine is a bit of a head case.
translation.es: Tu amiga Justine es un caso especial.

translation.en: Is she trying to start some trouble or something?
No, I didn't see Justine all night, but it's interesting that you ask.
translation.es: No vi a Justine en toda la noche, pero es interesante que preguntes.

translation.en: Know what's interesting to me?
Is that this party was supposed to bring you and me together,
translation.es: Que esta fiesta debía unirnos a ti y a mí,

translation.en: and as soon as everyone leaves, you retreat and ice up.
translation.es: y, en cuanto todos se van, pones distancia y enmudeces.

translation.en: How could you not tell me about this house, George?
translation.es: ¿Cómo no me contaste de esta casa, George?

translation.en: Jesus.
I was afraid this might happen.
That one of your lies would be exposed?
translation.es: ¿Que te expusiera una de tus mentiras?

translation.en: I wasn't lying to you, Cath. I was trying to spare you some unpleasantness.
translation.es: No te mentí, Cath. Quería ahorrarte algo desagradable.

translation.en: I can handle unpleasantness, George, okay? I lived through childbirth, remember?
translation.es: Puedo manejar lo desagradable, George. Viví un parto, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: I was trying to protect you.
Believe-- believe it or not, I- I actually wanted you to be happy here.
translation.es: Aunque no lo creas, quería que fueras feliz aquí.

translation.en: What the fuck is that?
Fucking electricity in this house!
What the…
The fuck is going on?
Franny's overdue for a visit with your parents. You can finish off the weekend there.
translation.es: Franny les debe una visita a tus padres. Puedes terminar el fin de semana allá.

translation.en: - - Floyd, it's Catherine.
translation.es: DOS PERSONAS MUEREN POR ASFIXIA SOSPECHOSA Floyd, soy Catherine.

translation.en: I'm ready.
This is her. This is Ella Vayle,
translation.es: Ella es la mujer, Ella Vayle.

translation.en: and this is the article I found about her death.
translation.es: Y este es el artículo que encontré sobre su muerte.

translation.en: But she's trying to…
She's reaching out to me, and I- I need to know why.
translation.es: Se contacta conmigo y necesito saber por qué.

translation.en: You're saying the spirit is the most recent resident of your house?
translation.es: ¿Dices que el espíritu es el residente más reciente de tu casa?

translation.en: Yes. I was confused before.
Well, my research turned up something interesting about the original owners,
translation.es: Tras investigar, encontré algo interesante sobre los dueños originales,

translation.en: especially for our group here.
What? The Smits?
Reverend Smit's wife was an early devotee of Swedenborg.
translation.es: La esposa del reverendo Smit era devota de Swedenborg.

translation.en: Unfortunately, it was not a happy marriage.
translation.es: Lamentablemente, no fue un matrimonio feliz.

translation.en: Smit was a strict Calvinist
who strongly disapproved of his wife's philosophic exploration.
translation.es: que desaprobaba la exploración filosófica de su esposa.

translation.en: Damned.
She died in their home rather mysteriously at age 26.
translation.es: Murió en la casa a los 26 años, misteriosamente.

translation.en: So much death in my house.
translation.es: Hay tanta muerte en mi casa.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. Don't think of it that way.
We embrace inhabited houses as a blessing.
translation.es: Nosotros aceptamos las casas habitadas como una bendición.

translation.en: - Mm. - Portals between two realms
translation.es: Son portales entre los dos reinos

translation.en: with guides to shepherd us once our own time comes.
translation.es: con guías para orientarnos cuando nos llegue el momento.

translation.en: Some religions call them guardian angels.
translation.es: A veces los llaman ángeles guardianes.

translation.en: Perhaps it's our Swedenborgian friend who first opened the portal door.
translation.es: Quizá abrió el portal nuestra amiga seguidora de Swedenborg.

translation.en: We are good at that.
Because it's the afterlife where we reach our greatest purpose.
translation.es: Porque es el más allá donde alcanzamos nuestro mayor propósito.

translation.en: You never see these spirits as potentially evil?
translation.es: ¿Nunca ven a estos espíritus como potencialmente malignos?

translation.en: An evil spirit will only commune with an evil- doer.
translation.es: Un espíritu maligno solo se comunicará con alguien maligno.

translation.en: Which we will take, on a leap of faith, that you're not.
translation.es: Haremos un acto de fe y asumiremos que tú no eres así.

translation.en: - - And remember. Evil only thrives in the house where it is welcome.
translation.es: Y recuerda que el mal solo crece en casas donde es bienvenido.

translation.en: - Mm. - Goodness always triumphs.
Always. If not in this world, then in the next.
translation.es: Siempre. Si no en esta vida, en la próxima.

translation.en: We should start, yes?
Let whomever the spirit is
speak for herself.
As evil comes to light,
translation.es: Cuando el mal salga a la luz,

translation.en: beware!
She's making her presence known. We welcome her, don't we, Catherine?
translation.es: Está haciéndose presente. Le damos la bienvenida, ¿no, Catherine?

translation.en: We do. We… I-- I do.
Get back here!
- No! - Ella.
- What happened? - She wants to break through.
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa? Está intentando cruzar, pero algo, alguien la detiene.

translation.en: She's trying. But something, someone is stopping her.
translation.es: Está intentando cruzar, pero algo, alguien la detiene.

translation.en: You're suffocating me!
What was that? Oh my God.
I'm afraid this home has another spirit.
translation.es: Me temo que esta casa tiene otro espíritu.

translation.en: And until that spirit reveals its nature,
translation.es: Y hasta que ese espíritu revele su naturaleza,

translation.en: be careful of those around you, Catherine.
translation.es: ten cuidado con quienes te rodean, Catherine.

Come here. Did you have fun at Grandma and Grandpa's house?
translation.es: - ¡Mamá! - Hola, cariño. Ven aquí. - ¿Te divertiste con los abuelos? - Sí.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Did you look for seashells on the beach?
translation.es: - ¿Te divertiste con los abuelos? - Sí. ¿Buscaste conchas en la playa?

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - Really? Are they pretty? Yeah!
Keep moving, everyone. Hustle.
We don't wanna get caught in traffic on the way into the city.

translation.en: Nearly there, nearly full.
Tommy, good. Thank you for com--
- Justine. - George.
I, uh, I didn't know you were joining us.
translation.es: No sabía que te nos unirías.

I'm here!
Right, Katie. You're the last.
Where are we going?
Get in the car, baby. I'll be there in a sec.
translation.es: Ve subiendo al auto, hija. Yo ya voy.

translation.en: Eddie!
There's something I have to give you that I, uh…
found in the house a while back before I learned the truth.
translation.es: en la casa hace un tiempo, antes de enterarme la verdad.

- Just leave it. - No, no, it belongs to you and Cole.
translation.es: Déjatelo. No, les pertenece a ti y a Cole. Ella hubiese querido eso.

translation.en: She would want you to have this.
translation.es: No, les pertenece a ti y a Cole. Ella hubiese querido eso.

translation.en: I don't want it.
I noticed it on you a couple weeks ago.
translation.es: Te lo vi hace unas semanas.

translation.en: It just seemed right.
You and Mom would have liked each other.
translation.es: Tú y mamá se habrían llevado bien.

I found that overdue one in my husband's car, I can pay the fine.
translation.es: El que se pasó de fecha lo tenía mi esposo, pagaré la multa.

translation.en: It's just on his card.
Actually, this one's checked out under the name Willis Howell.
translation.es: Este figura bajo el nombre de Willis Howell.

translation.en: Oh, that's odd.
It's unisex, you know?
Excuse me? The name, Willis.
She's a pretty thing. In here a lot on weekends.
translation.es: Es una chica bonita. Suele venir los fines de semana.

translation.en: Daddy's friend.
Don't worry. I'll ask her to pay the fine.
translation.es: No se preocupe. Le cobraré la multa a ella.

translation.en: I'd like to open a new account.
Of course, Mrs. Claire.
Uh, just… just fill out, um, this form.
translation.es: Simplemente, tiene que llenar este formulario.

translation.en: Uh, we will require George's signature if it's a joint account.
translation.es: George debe firmar si es una cuenta conjunta.

translation.en: It's not.
Okay, everyone. Here we are.
George Claire?
Good God.
Dr. Warren. Wow.
What an odd coincidence. Odd indeed.
translation.es: - Qué coincidencia tan extraña. - Sin dudas.

translation.en: I was told that you had moved away for good.
translation.es: Me dijeron que te habías mudado a otra ciudad.

translation.en: Well, I, you know, couldn't resist coming back for this exhibit.
translation.es: Bueno, no pude resistir volver a esta exhibición.

translation.en: You might remember my passion for Thomas Cole.
translation.es: Quizá recuerdes mi pasión por Thomas Cole.

translation.en: Yes, I do. I just wish you had shown the same passion for your dissertation.
translation.es: Sí. Ojalá hubieras mostrado la misma pasión por tu tesis.

translation.en: Excuse me. Professor Claire, um,
in the third Voyage of Life painting, why is the sailor so distraught?
translation.es: En la tercera obra de El viaje de la vida, ¿por qué el marinero está angustiado?

translation.en: Oh, the third one is called, uh, Manhood.
Uh, it's when Cole believes we, uh, we lose the confidence of youth.
translation.es: Es cuando Cole cree que perdemos la confianza de la juventud.

translation.en: Uh, go-- go check out the sailor's hands. They're no longer on the tiller.
translation.es: Fíjense en las manos del marinero. Ya no están en el timón.

translation.en: - Thanks, Professor Claire. -
Yeah… You know, I'm curious. Um…
How did you get a teaching position without a recommendation?
translation.es: ¿Cómo obtuviste un puesto de profesor sin recomendación?

translation.en: Oh, I'm, um, I'm just a temp instructor.
Um, one of the professors took an emergency leave, and I, uh…
translation.es: Uno de los profesores se tomó una licencia de emergencia,

translation.en: I just stepped in to help.
translation.es: y yo solo vine a ayudar.

translation.en: Interesting, then, how the students, uh, they call you professor.
translation.es: Es interesante que los estudiantes te llamen profesor.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
Uh, yeah, right. I keep correcting them.
Yeah. I get so tired of correcting them.
Good day, Claire.
What… What was all that about?
Uh, yeah, I have no idea.
I kind of think you do.
I don't think you should see Justine anymore.
translation.es: Prefiero que no veas más a Justine.

translation.en: There's a lot of talk about her at Saginaw.
translation.es: Hay muchos rumores de ella en Saginaw.

translation.en: What kind of talk, George?
Well, they say she's a closet lesbian.
translation.es: Dicen que es una lesbiana reprimida.

translation.en: And she's clearly obsessed with you.
I think she is…
instigating problems between us intentionally.
translation.es: de crear problemas entre nosotros a propósito.

translation.en: Floyd, heading home for the holiday?  What?
Oh, no, no. Not for a while yet. I- I still have, uh…
translation.es: No, aún no. Tengo que atender un asunto.

translation.en: - I have work to finish. - Is something wrong?
translation.es: No, aún no. Tengo que atender un asunto. ¿Pasa algo?

translation.en: Actually,
I got a call this morning from Shelby Warren,
translation.es: esta mañana recibí una llamada de Shelby Warren,

translation.en: your advisor from Columbia.
His recommendation letter, the one submitted with your application,
translation.es: Según dice, la carta de recomendación que presentaste para tu solicitud

translation.en: he claims he never wrote it.
Shelby's recollection is that you asked him,
translation.es: Shelby recuerda que le preguntaste, pero te respondió que no podía hacerlo.

translation.en: but he told you he couldn't do it.
translation.es: Shelby recuerda que le preguntaste, pero te respondió que no podía hacerlo. Quería la conciencia tranquila. Recuerdo la conversación.

translation.en: In good conscience. I remember the conversation well.
translation.es: Quería la conciencia tranquila. Recuerdo la conversación.

translation.en: - You forged it, didn't you? - No. I… I…
Floyd, I wrote the letter that I deserved.
translation.es: Floyd, escribí la carta que me merecía.

translation.en: I-- I-- You need to understand why.
As you know, I'm quite fond of you, George,
translation.es: Como sabes, te aprecio mucho, y eres popular con tus alumnos,

translation.en: and you're popular with your students, but this is a serious accusation.
translation.es: Como sabes, te aprecio mucho, y eres popular con tus alumnos, pero esto es una acusación seria.

translation.en: Can't we put a pin in this until after the holiday? - Oh… - Please, please, Floyd.
translation.es: ¿No podemos esperar a que pasen las fiestas? Por favor, Floyd.

translation.en: I-- I understand your dilemma. I do.
Floyd, I-- I have my entire family up here.
translation.es: Floyd, tengo a toda mi familia aquí.

translation.en: I'm supposed to be home in an hour.
translation.es: Debo llegar a casa en una hora.

translation.en: I-- I really deserve the chance to sit down and be heard.
translation.es: Merezco la oportunidad de sentarme y que me escuches.

translation.en: Man to man, huh?
Friend to friend.
I'll schedule an appointment.
I know you all think that Audrey is a quite calm, conservative soul,
translation.es: Sé que todos creen que Audrey es un alma tranquila y conservadora,

translation.en: but back in the day, she was absolutely wild.
translation.es: pero, de joven, era absolutamente salvaje.

translation.en: - Don't believe a word! - And then George came along.
translation.es: - No le crean nada. - Y después llegó George.

translation.en: And he was always getting into trouble, which is why I went gray by 30.
translation.es: Siempre se metía en problemas, por eso quedé canoso a los 30.

translation.en: Oh, stop!
But the real troublemaker was this cousin that George idolized.
translation.es: Pero el verdadero alborotador era un primo que George idolatraba.

translation.en: Turned out to be a first- class homo.
I don't know what was worse for his parents: that he drowned or was gay.
translation.es: No sé qué afectó más a los padres: que se haya ahogado o que fuera gay.

translation.en: That is a truly repugnant thing to say.
She's right, Tom.
Henry's death was a family tragedy.
translation.es: La muerte de Henry fue una tragedia.

translation.en: He was such a talented young man.
Henry used to do these exquisite watercolors. Teeny- tiny paintings.
translation.es: Henry hacía unas acuarelas bellísimas. Eran pinturas pequeñas.

translation.en: What were the… the paintings of?
Oh, the shoreline, ospreys, lighthouses.
Just common seaside things.
Turkey time, everybody.
It's the way he presented them that was unique.
translation.es: Pero la forma en que las presentaba era extraordinaria.

translation.en: They even wanted to do a showing of his work after he passed, but…
translation.es: Incluso quisieron exhibir su trabajo después de su muerte,

translation.en: they all just disappeared, apparently.
translation.es: pero desaparecieron las obras, al parecer.

translation.en: - What a shame. - It really was.
translation.es: - Qué pena. - Ni que lo digas.

translation.en: - Nice job on the turkey, George. - Thank you.
translation.es: - Ese pavo luce rico, George. - Gracias.

translation.en: Please, eat. It's gonna get cold.
translation.es: Por favor, coman. Se va a enfriar.

translation.en: Could you excuse me one minute?
So you're starting with all this again?
translation.es: ¿Otra vez vas a empezar con todo esto?

translation.en: I happen to be sick, George.
Throwing up my marriage.
Now leave me the fuck alone!
- Catherine… -
What the fuck?
Cath? Catherine?
George?
Please.
Please.
No one understands us.
I am here for you.
George.
Free yourself.
How was your holiday?
Hello, Floyd.
George.
I didn't expect to see you till tomorrow.
Taking advantage of the warm spell we're having, huh?
translation.es: Vas a aprovechar el calorcito que está haciendo, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah, I thought I'd go out one last time before storing her for winter.
translation.es: Sí, pensé en salir una última vez antes de guardarlo para el invierno.

translation.en: You're so lucky to have her.
That last spin you took me on, it…  …it really reminded me how much I-- I miss sailing.
translation.es: Con ese paseo que dimos la otra vez, recordé lo mucho que extraño navegar.

translation.en: Especially when… when I'm feeling a little… a little low.
translation.es: Especialmente, cuando ando de capa caída.

translation.en: You want to join me?
Oh, no. I-- I…
- I don't want to in-- intrude. - It's fine.
The river's as good a place as any to have our talk.
Hey.
What's the matter? Are you okay?
Things…
just aren't great.
It's him, isn't it?
I know his kind all too well.
translation.es: Conozco bien a los de su tipo.

translation.en: I grew up with it.
If I had someone as good as you, I'd kiss the fucking ground she walked on.
translation.es: Si tuviera a alguien como tú, me sentiría el hombre más afortunado.

translation.en: I swear to God.
I'm eager to tell you the truth
translation.es: Estoy ansioso por contarte la verdad

translation.en: about the… problems I had at Columbia with… with Shelby.
translation.es: sobre los problemas que tuve en Columbia con Shelby.

translation.en: Look, it's a complicated story, but, um…
essentially,
I got ostracized…
for reporting misconduct.
It was… it was sexual misconduct.
Look, I'm willing to listen, because I-- I care about your well- being,
translation.es: Estoy dispuesto a escucharte porque me importa tu bienestar,

translation.en: but forgery, regardless of the reason, is a crime.
translation.es: pero falsificar un documento, más allá del motivo, es un delito.

translation.en: I don't want us meeting on false pretenses here.
I can't keep this to myself forever.
translation.es: No puedo guardarme esto para siempre.

translation.en: Yeah, I- I understand that, and- and, look, I appreciate your dilemma--
translation.es: Entiendo eso y entiendo tu dilema…

translation.en: So…
So tomorrow, I plan to bring the situation to HR.
translation.es: mañana planeo llevar la situación a recursos humanos.

translation.en: And we both know the outcome.
They won't permit you to remain on staff.
translation.es: No te permitirán seguir en el plantel.

translation.en: You okay, George?
There, there.
All things must pass.
Yeah.
I promise you'll get through this.
translation.es: Te juro que vas a salir adelante.

translation.en: - Hey, Cal. - Hey.
I called in a take- out order.
Be right back.
Excuse me. Sorry, I just wonder…
Where did you buy that scarf?
It was a gift.
There you go, $6.57.

translation.en: You're putting in late nights too, huh, George?
Jesus.
Look--

Officially? No.

translation.es: No le gustó tanto, en realidad.

Well, that explains the neck it ended up on, then, huh?

Government said there was no way

show me a sign.
Oh my God!
What the fuck is going…

translation.es: como Floyd DeBeers, profesor de Saginaw, de 68 años,

translation.es: un miembro frecuente de la comunidad náutica.

translation.en: Oh… oh my God.
Jesus.
Yeah.
I know you two became very close very quickly,

translation.es: así que te mantendré al tanto del funeral.

Oh God, um…

Who did this?
Who the fuck is responsible for this?

You know? I think I'm gonna give her a kiss anyway.

translation.en: - George. -
Why is she dressed?

You know that they're expecting a deep freeze tonight?

Hey, where are you going?
- Jesus! - Get downstairs.
Get off!
- Get off of me! - Hey, Catherine!
Catherine!
What are you doing, huh? What the hell is this?
Let go of me, George!
Where do you think you're going? With my goddamn daughter!

translation.en: - Home! - This is your fucking home!
Nowhere's home with you, George!
Fuck!
I know about Floyd!
Your clothes were soaked that night! And Justine? You hated her.

Oh, you've… you've really lost your mind, you know that?
You've-- you've gone way, way over the edge!

translation.es: que creaste en tu cerebro paranoico y privado de comida.

No!
Help!

Franny!
Franny!
Ella, help me.
Fate.
Catherine.

Where did he put you?

Our essence… united.
Baby?

for the power to stop this.
Baby.

As she was there for me,

No.
- Stop this! - No!
George.
George.
Free yourself.
Those who commune with evil never win.

Mrs. Claire?

Bye, Mrs. Claire.
Feel better.
Laughton residence.

Um, apparently, something happened to his wife.

translation.en: It's…
Is that your ax, George?
29- year- old Catherine Claire was found brutally murdered
translation.es: Catherine Claire, de 29 años, fue brutalmente asesinada

translation.es: en su granja, aquí en Chosen.

You've heard.
- I should have done something. - Okay.
Here it comes.
All right, here we go.
What's your gut?

translation.en: From Manhattan.

translation.es: Mañana a primera hora, nos vamos de este lugar abandonado.

translation.en: No, no, I never…

translation.en: That doesn't mean that they'd put an ax in their gut.

translation.es: - ¿O si ella lo engañaba a él? - Solo sé que fue él, ¿sí?

translation.en: You have to believe me, okay?

translation.en: I never said I don't, son, but you're giving me nothing here.

Took the art department out for drinks,

No.
Not Eddie.

translation.es: Travis, es obvio que fue George Claire. Tienes que arrestarlo. Lo sé.

translation.en: - Guardian angel. - Wake up.
Goodness always triumphs.
If not in this world, then in the next.

Justine, it's time.
George?

Sokolov. Justine Sokolov.
I'll just…

Unrecognized.

Go.

I'd really appreciate it, sir.
Mind just giving me a hand?
Travis.
Good afternoon.

translation.en: Damned.
Damned.
Damned.
Damned. Damned.
The world of spirits is not Heaven or Hell.

We have lost our children.
Because of you,
we are joined in spirit.
Because of you, our powers grow…

…into an endless sea.
